item.title: 代码基础第9讲：策略回测与优化
item.description:
目录

  • 学习目标
  • 回测系统架构设计
    • 回测系统核心组件
  • 回测引擎实现
    • 高级回测引擎
  • 参数优化方法
    • 网格搜索优化
    • 遗传算法优化
  • 过拟合检测与防范
    • 过拟合检测方法
  • 性能评估指标
    • 综合性能评估器

学习目标

通过本讲的学习，你将掌握：

  • 回测系统的架构设计与实现
  • 参数优化方法与算法
  • 过拟合检测与防范技术
  • 策略性能评估与指标分析
  • 交易成本建模与滑点处理
  • 多策略组合与风险管理
  • 回测结果可视化与报告生成
  • 实盘前的准备工作

from abc import ABC, abstractmethod
from dataclasses import dataclass
from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Tuple, Any
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import json
import pickle
from pathlib import Path

@dataclass
class BacktestConfig:
 """回测配置"""
 start_date: datetime
 end_date: datetime
 initial_capital: float = 100000
 commission_rate: float = 0.001
 slippage_rate: float = 0.0005
 min_commission: float = 5.0
 max_position_size: float = 0.1
 max_portfolio_risk: float = 0.02
 risk_free_rate: float = 0.03
 benchmark: str = "SH000300"
 rebalance_frequency: str = "daily" # daily, weekly, monthly
 
@dataclass
class TradeRecord:
 """交易记录"""
 timestamp: datetime
 symbol: str
 action: str # BUY, SELL
 quantity: int
 price: float
 commission: float
 slippage: float
 total_cost: float
 portfolio_value: float
 position_size: float
 
@dataclass
class PortfolioSnapshot:
 """组合快照"""
 timestamp: datetime
 total_value: float
 cash: float
 positions: Dict[str, int]
 weights: Dict[str, float]
 returns: float
 cumulative_returns: float
 drawdown: float
 volatility: float

class BacktestEngine:
 """回测引擎基类"""
 
 def __init__(self, config: BacktestConfig):
 self.config = config
 self.portfolio = self.initialize_portfolio()
 self.trade_history = []
 self.portfolio_history = []
 self.signals_history = []
 self.performance_metrics = {}
 self.is_running = False
 
 def initialize_portfolio(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """初始化组合"""
 return {
 'cash': self.config.initial_capital,
 'positions': {},
 'total_value': self.config.initial_capital,
 'weights': {}
 }
 
 @abstractmethod
 def generate_signals(self, data: pd.DataFrame, timestamp: datetime) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
 """生成交易信号"""
 pass
 
 @abstractmethod
 def calculate_position_size(self, signal: Dict[str, Any], current_price: float) -> int:
 """计算仓位大小"""
 pass
 
 def run_backtest(self, market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame], 
 strategy_params: Dict[str, Any] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """运行回测"""
 print(f"开始回测: {self.config.start_date} 到 {self.config.end_date}")
 self.is_running = True
 
 # 获取交易日历
 trading_dates = self.get_trading_dates(market_data)
 
 for current_date in trading_dates:
 if not self.is_running:
 break
 
 # 获取当日数据
 daily_data = self.get_daily_data(market_data, current_date)
 
 if daily_data.empty:
 continue
 
 # 生成交易信号
 signals = self.generate_signals(daily_data, current_date)
 self.signals_history.append({
 'timestamp': current_date,
 'signals': signals
 })
 
 # 执行交易
 for signal in signals:
 self.execute_trade(signal, daily_data, current_date)
 
 # 更新组合价值
 self.update_portfolio_value(daily_data, current_date)
 
 # 记录组合状态
 self.record_portfolio_snapshot(current_date)
 
 # 计算性能指标
 self.calculate_performance_metrics()
 
 return self.generate_backtest_report()
 
 def get_trading_dates(self, market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame]) -> List[datetime]:
 """获取交易日历"""
 # 使用第一个股票的数据日期作为交易日历
 symbol = list(market_data.keys())[0]
 data = market_data[symbol]
 
 # 过滤日期范围
 mask = (data.index >= self.config.start_date) & (data.index <= self.config.end_date)
 trading_dates = data.index[mask].tolist()
 
 return trading_dates
 
 def get_daily_data(self, market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame], 
 date: datetime) -> pd.DataFrame:
 """获取当日市场数据"""
 daily_data = {}
 
 for symbol, data in market_data.items():
 if date in data.index:
 daily_data[symbol] = data.loc[date]
 
 return pd.DataFrame(daily_data).T
 
 def execute_trade(self, signal: Dict[str, Any], market_data: pd.DataFrame, 
 timestamp: datetime):
 """执行交易"""
 symbol = signal['symbol']
 action = signal['action']
 quantity = signal.get('quantity', 0)
 
 if symbol not in market_data.index:
 return
 
 # 获取当前价格
 current_data = market_data.loc[symbol]
 current_price = current_data['close']
 
 # 计算交易成本和滑点
 commission = max(self.config.min_commission, 
 quantity * current_price * self.config.commission_rate)
 slippage = quantity * current_price * self.config.slippage_rate
 total_cost = quantity * current_price + commission + slippage
 
 # 执行买入
 if action == 'BUY':
 if self.portfolio['cash'] >= total_cost:
 # 更新现金
 self.portfolio['cash'] -= total_cost
 
 # 更新持仓
 if symbol in self.portfolio['positions']:
 self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] += quantity
 else:
 self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] = quantity
 
 # 记录交易
 trade = TradeRecord(
 timestamp=timestamp,
 symbol=symbol,
 action='BUY',
 quantity=quantity,
 price=current_price,
 commission=commission,
 slippage=slippage,
 total_cost=total_cost,
 portfolio_value=self.portfolio['total_value'],
 position_size=quantity * current_price / self.portfolio['total_value']
 )
 self.trade_history.append(trade)
 
 print(f"买入: {symbol} {quantity}股 @ {current_price:.2f}, 成本: {total_cost:.2f}")
 
 # 执行卖出
 elif action == 'SELL':
 if symbol in self.portfolio['positions'] and self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] >= quantity:
 # 更新现金
 self.portfolio['cash'] += (quantity * current_price - commission - slippage)
 
 # 更新持仓
 self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] -= quantity
 if self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] == 0:
 del self.portfolio['positions'][symbol]
 
 # 记录交易
 trade = TradeRecord(
 timestamp=timestamp,
 symbol=symbol,
 action='SELL',
 quantity=quantity,
 price=current_price,
 commission=commission,
 slippage=slippage,
 total_cost=quantity * current_price - commission - slippage,
 portfolio_value=self.portfolio['total_value'],
 position_size=quantity * current_price / self.portfolio['total_value']
 )
 self.trade_history.append(trade)
 
 print(f"卖出: {symbol} {quantity}股 @ {current_price:.2f}, 收入: {total_cost:.2f}")
 
 def update_portfolio_value(self, market_data: pd.DataFrame, timestamp: datetime):
 """更新组合价值"""
 total_value = self.portfolio['cash']
 
 for symbol, position in self.portfolio['positions'].items():
 if symbol in market_data.index:
 current_price = market_data.loc[symbol, 'close']
 total_value += position * current_price
 
 self.portfolio['total_value'] = total_value
 
 # 更新权重
 weights = {}
 for symbol, position in self.portfolio['positions'].items():
 if symbol in market_data.index:
 current_price = market_data.loc[symbol, 'close']
 position_value = position * current_price
 weights[symbol] = position_value / total_value if total_value > 0 else 0
 
 self.portfolio['weights'] = weights
 
 def record_portfolio_snapshot(self, timestamp: datetime):
 """记录组合快照"""
 snapshot = PortfolioSnapshot(
 timestamp=timestamp,
 total_value=self.portfolio['total_value'],
 cash=self.portfolio['cash'],
 positions=self.portfolio['positions'].copy(),
 weights=self.portfolio['weights'].copy(),
 returns=0.0,
 cumulative_returns=0.0,
 drawdown=0.0,
 volatility=0.0
 )
 
 self.portfolio_history.append(snapshot)
 
 def calculate_performance_metrics(self):
 """计算性能指标"""
 if not self.portfolio_history:
 return
 
 # 转换为DataFrame
 portfolio_df = pd.DataFrame([
 {
 'timestamp': s.timestamp,
 'total_value': s.total_value,
 'cash': s.cash
 } for s in self.portfolio_history
 ])
 
 # 计算收益率
 portfolio_df['returns'] = portfolio_df['total_value'].pct_change()
 portfolio_df['cumulative_returns'] = (1 + portfolio_df['returns'].fillna(0)).cumprod() - 1
 
 # 更新快照
 for i, snapshot in enumerate(self.portfolio_history):
 if i > 0:
 snapshot.returns = portfolio_df.iloc[i]['returns']
 snapshot.cumulative_returns = portfolio_df.iloc[i]['cumulative_returns']
 
 # 计算详细指标
 self.performance_metrics = self.calculate_detailed_metrics(portfolio_df['returns'])
 
 def calculate_detailed_metrics(self, returns: pd.Series) -> Dict[str, float]:
 """计算详细性能指标"""
 metrics = {}
 
 # 基本指标
 total_return = (self.portfolio_history[-1].total_value - self.config.initial_capital) / self.config.initial_capital
 metrics['total_return'] = total_return
 
 # 年化收益率
 days = len(returns)
 metrics['annual_return'] = (1 + total_return) ** (252 / days) - 1 if days > 0 else 0
 
 # 年化波动率
 metrics['annual_volatility'] = returns.std() * np.sqrt(252)
 
 # 夏普比率
 excess_returns = metrics['annual_return'] - self.config.risk_free_rate
 metrics['sharpe_ratio'] = excess_returns / metrics['annual_volatility'] if metrics['annual_volatility'] > 0 else 0
 
 # 最大回撤
 cumulative = (1 + returns.fillna(0)).cumprod()
 running_max = cumulative.expanding().max()
 drawdown = (cumulative - running_max) / running_max
 metrics['max_drawdown'] = drawdown.min()
 
 # 卡尔马比率
 if abs(metrics['max_drawdown']) > 0:
 metrics['calmar_ratio'] = metrics['annual_return'] / abs(metrics['max_drawdown'])
 else:
 metrics['calmar_ratio'] = 0
 
 # 胜率
 if len(self.trade_history) > 0:
 winning_trades = [t for t in self.trade_history if t.action == 'SELL']
 metrics['win_rate'] = len(winning_trades) / len(self.trade_history)
 else:
 metrics['win_rate'] = 0
 
 # 交易统计
 metrics['total_trades'] = len(self.trade_history)
 metrics['avg_trade_return'] = np.mean([t.total_cost for t in self.trade_history]) if self.trade_history else 0
 
 return metrics
 
 def generate_backtest_report(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """生成回测报告"""
 return {
 'config': self.config,
 'performance_metrics': self.performance_metrics,
 'trade_history': self.trade_history,
 'portfolio_history': self.portfolio_history,
 'signals_history': self.signals_history,
 'final_portfolio_value': self.portfolio['total_value'],
 'total_return': self.performance_metrics.get('total_return', 0),
 'sharpe_ratio': self.performance_metrics.get('sharpe_ratio', 0),
 'max_drawdown': self.performance_metrics.get('max_drawdown', 0)
 }

class AdvancedBacktestEngine(BacktestEngine):
 """高级回测引擎"""
 
 def __init__(self, config: BacktestConfig):
 super().__init__(config)
 self.benchmark_data = None
 self.risk_model = None
 self.transaction_cost_model = None
 self.slippage_model = None
 self.market_impact_model = None
 
 def set_benchmark(self, benchmark_data: pd.DataFrame):
 """设置基准数据"""
 self.benchmark_data = benchmark_data
 
 def set_risk_model(self, risk_model):
 """设置风险模型"""
 self.risk_model = risk_model
 
 def set_transaction_cost_model(self, cost_model):
 """设置交易成本模型"""
 self.transaction_cost_model = cost_model
 
 def calculate_transaction_cost(self, symbol: str, quantity: int, 
 price: float, action: str) -> Dict[str, float]:
 """计算交易成本"""
 base_cost = quantity * price
 
 # 基本佣金
 commission = max(self.config.min_commission, base_cost * self.config.commission_rate)
 
 # 使用高级成本模型（如果设置）
 if self.transaction_cost_model:
 additional_costs = self.transaction_cost_model.calculate_cost(
 symbol, quantity, price, action
 )
 commission += additional_costs.get('additional_commission', 0)
 
 # 滑点
 slippage = base_cost * self.config.slippage_rate
 
 # 市场冲击（大额交易）
 if quantity * price > 100000: # 超过10万元
 market_impact = base_cost * 0.0005 # 额外0.05%冲击成本
 else:
 market_impact = 0
 
 return {
 'commission': commission,
 'slippage': slippage,
 'market_impact': market_impact,
 'total_cost': commission + slippage + market_impact
 }
 
 def execute_trade_with_impact(self, signal: Dict[str, Any], 
 market_data: pd.DataFrame, timestamp: datetime):
 """执行交易（考虑市场冲击）"""
 symbol = signal['symbol']
 action = signal['action']
 quantity = signal.get('quantity', 0)
 
 if symbol not in market_data.index:
 return
 
 # 获取当前价格
 current_data = market_data.loc[symbol]
 current_price = current_data['close']
 
 # 计算交易成本
 costs = self.calculate_transaction_cost(symbol, quantity, current_price, action)
 
 # 大额交易的价格冲击
 if quantity * current_price > 100000:
 # 模拟市场冲击导致的价格滑点
 if action == 'BUY':
 executed_price = current_price * 1.001 # 买入价格上升0.1%
 else:
 executed_price = current_price * 0.999 # 卖出价格下降0.1%
 else:
 executed_price = current_price
 
 total_transaction_cost = quantity * executed_price + costs['total_cost']
 
 # 执行交易逻辑（与基础引擎类似，但使用实际执行价格）
 if action == 'BUY' and self.portfolio['cash'] >= total_transaction_cost:
 self.portfolio['cash'] -= total_transaction_cost
 self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] = self.portfolio['positions'].get(symbol, 0) + quantity
 
 elif action == 'SELL' and symbol in self.portfolio['positions']:
 if self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] >= quantity:
 self.portfolio['cash'] += (quantity * executed_price - costs['total_cost'])
 self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] -= quantity
 if self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] == 0:
 del self.portfolio['positions'][symbol]
 
 # 记录详细交易信息
 trade = TradeRecord(
 timestamp=timestamp,
 symbol=symbol,
 action=action,
 quantity=quantity,
 price=executed_price,
 commission=costs['commission'],
 slippage=costs['slippage'],
 total_cost=total_transaction_cost,
 portfolio_value=self.portfolio['total_value'],
 position_size=quantity * executed_price / self.portfolio['total_value']
 )
 self.trade_history.append(trade)
 
 def calculate_risk_adjusted_metrics(self, returns: pd.Series) -> Dict[str, float]:
 """计算风险调整指标"""
 metrics = {}
 
 # 基础指标
 metrics.update(self.calculate_detailed_metrics(returns))
 
 # 索提诺比率（下行风险）
 downside_returns = returns[returns < 0]
 if len(downside_returns) > 0:
 downside_std = downside_returns.std() * np.sqrt(252)
 excess_return = metrics['annual_return'] - self.config.risk_free_rate
 metrics['sortino_ratio'] = excess_return / downside_std if downside_std > 0 else 0
 else:
 metrics['sortino_ratio'] = np.inf
 
 # 信息比率（相对基准）
 if self.benchmark_data is not None:
 benchmark_returns = self.calculate_benchmark_returns()
 active_returns = returns - benchmark_returns
 tracking_error = active_returns.std() * np.sqrt(252)
 
 if tracking_error > 0:
 metrics['information_ratio'] = active_returns.mean() * 252 / tracking_error
 else:
 metrics['information_ratio'] = 0
 
 # 收益一致性
 monthly_returns = returns.resample('M').apply(lambda x: (1 + x).prod() - 1)
 metrics['consistency'] = (monthly_returns > 0).mean()
 
 # 风险价值（VaR）
 metrics['var_95'] = np.percentile(returns, 5)
 metrics['var_99'] = np.percentile(returns, 1)
 
 # 预期亏损（CVaR）
 metrics['cvar_95'] = returns[returns <= metrics['var_95']].mean()
 
 return metrics
 
 def calculate_benchmark_returns(self) -> pd.Series:
 """计算基准收益率"""
 if self.benchmark_data is None:
 return pd.Series(dtype=float)
 
 # 过滤回测期间的数据
 mask = (self.benchmark_data.index >= self.config.start_date) & \
 (self.benchmark_data.index <= self.config.end_date)
 benchmark_period = self.benchmark_data[mask]
 
 # 计算日收益率
 benchmark_returns = benchmark_period['close'].pct_change()
 
 return benchmark_returns
 
 def generate_comprehensive_report(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """生成综合回测报告"""
 basic_report = self.generate_backtest_report()
 
 # 添加风险调整指标
 if self.portfolio_history:
 returns = pd.Series([s.returns for s in self.portfolio_history[1:]])
 risk_metrics = self.calculate_risk_adjusted_metrics(returns)
 basic_report['risk_metrics'] = risk_metrics
 
 # 添加基准比较
 if self.benchmark_data is not None:
 basic_report['benchmark_comparison'] = self.compare_with_benchmark()
 
 # 添加交易分析
 basic_report['trade_analysis'] = self.analyze_trades()
 
 return basic_report
 
 def compare_with_benchmark(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """与基准比较"""
 if self.benchmark_data is None:
 return {}
 
 # 计算策略收益率
 strategy_returns = pd.Series([s.returns for s in self.portfolio_history[1:]])
 
 # 计算基准收益率
 benchmark_returns = self.calculate_benchmark_returns()
 
 # 对齐时间序列
 aligned_data = pd.concat([strategy_returns, benchmark_returns], axis=1).dropna()
 strategy_aligned = aligned_data.iloc[:, 0]
 benchmark_aligned = aligned_data.iloc[:, 1]
 
 # 计算相对表现
 comparison = {
 'strategy_total_return': (1 + strategy_aligned).prod() - 1,
 'benchmark_total_return': (1 + benchmark_aligned).prod() - 1,
 'excess_return': (1 + strategy_aligned).prod() - (1 + benchmark_aligned).prod(),
 'correlation': strategy_aligned.corr(benchmark_aligned),
 'beta': self.calculate_beta(strategy_aligned, benchmark_aligned),
 'alpha': self.calculate_alpha(strategy_aligned, benchmark_aligned)
 }
 
 return comparison
 
 def calculate_beta(self, strategy_returns: pd.Series, benchmark_returns: pd.Series) -> float:
 """计算Beta值"""
 covariance = np.cov(strategy_returns, benchmark_returns)[0, 1]
 benchmark_variance = np.var(benchmark_returns)
 
 return covariance / benchmark_variance if benchmark_variance > 0 else 0
 
 def calculate_alpha(self, strategy_returns: pd.Series, benchmark_returns: pd.Series) -> float:
 """计算Alpha值"""
 beta = self.calculate_beta(strategy_returns, benchmark_returns)
 strategy_return = strategy_returns.mean() * 252
 benchmark_return = benchmark_returns.mean() * 252
 
 return strategy_return - (self.config.risk_free_rate + beta * (benchmark_return - self.config.risk_free_rate))
 
 def analyze_trades(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """分析交易记录"""
 if not self.trade_history:
 return {}
 
 trades_df = pd.DataFrame([
 {
 'timestamp': t.timestamp,
 'symbol': t.symbol,
 'action': t.action,
 'quantity': t.quantity,
 'price': t.price,
 'total_cost': t.total_cost,
 'commission': t.commission,
 'position_size': t.position_size
 } for t in self.trade_history
 ])
 
 analysis = {
 'total_trades': len(trades_df),
 'buy_trades': len(trades_df[trades_df['action'] == 'BUY']),
 'sell_trades': len(trades_df[trades_df['action'] == 'SELL']),
 'total_commission': trades_df['commission'].sum(),
 'avg_position_size': trades_df['position_size'].mean(),
 'max_position_size': trades_df['position_size'].max(),
 'trading_frequency': len(trades_df) / len(self.portfolio_history) if self.portfolio_history else 0
 }
 
 # 按股票分析
 symbol_analysis = trades_df.groupby('symbol').agg({
 'total_cost': ['count', 'sum', 'mean'],
 'commission': 'sum',
 'position_size': 'mean'
 }).round(4)
 
 analysis['symbol_analysis'] = symbol_analysis.to_dict()
 
 return analysis

class ParameterOptimizer:
 """参数优化器"""
 
 def __init__(self, backtest_engine: BacktestEngine):
 self.engine = backtest_engine
 self.optimization_results = []
 self.best_params = None
 self.best_performance = None
 
 def grid_search(self, param_grid: Dict[str, List[Any]], 
 market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame],
 optimization_metric: str = 'sharpe_ratio') -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """网格搜索优化"""
 
 print("开始网格搜索参数优化...")
 
 # 生成所有参数组合
 param_combinations = self.generate_param_combinations(param_grid)
 total_combinations = len(param_combinations)
 
 print(f"总共有 {total_combinations} 种参数组合需要测试")
 
 best_metric = -np.inf
 best_params = None
 optimization_results = []
 
 for i, params in enumerate(param_combinations):
 print(f"测试参数组合 {i+1}/{total_combinations}: {params}")
 
 # 运行回测
 result = self.run_backtest_with_params(params, market_data)
 
 if result and optimization_metric in result['performance_metrics']:
 metric_value = result['performance_metrics'][optimization_metric]
 
 # 记录结果
 optimization_results.append({
 'params': params,
 'metrics': result['performance_metrics'],
 'metric_value': metric_value
 })
 
 # 更新最佳参数
 if metric_value > best_metric:
 best_metric = metric_value
 best_params = params
 self.best_performance = result['performance_metrics']
 
 print(f" 找到更好的参数组合！{optimization_metric}: {metric_value:.4f}")
 
 self.optimization_results = optimization_results
 self.best_params = best_params
 
 return {
 'best_params': best_params,
 'best_metric': best_metric,
 'optimization_results': optimization_results,
 'total_combinations': total_combinations
 }
 
 def generate_param_combinations(self, param_grid: Dict[str, List[Any]]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
 """生成参数组合"""
 import itertools
 
 param_names = list(param_grid.keys())
 param_values = list(param_grid.values())
 
 combinations = list(itertools.product(*param_values))
 
 return [dict(zip(param_names, combo)) for combo in combinations]
 
 def run_backtest_with_params(self, params: Dict[str, Any], 
 market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """使用指定参数运行回测"""
 try:
 # 创建新的策略实例（这里简化处理，实际应该根据参数创建不同策略）
 strategy_params = params
 
 # 这里假设引擎有方法根据参数调整策略
 # 实际实现中需要修改引擎使其支持参数化策略
 result = self.engine.run_backtest(market_data, strategy_params)
 
 return result
 
 except Exception as e:
 print(f"回测失败: {e}")
 return None
 
 def random_search(self, param_distributions: Dict[str, Tuple[Any, Any]], 
 n_iterations: int, market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame],
 optimization_metric: str = 'sharpe_ratio') -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """随机搜索优化"""
 
 print(f"开始随机搜索参数优化（{n_iterations}次迭代）...")
 
 best_metric = -np.inf
 best_params = None
 optimization_results = []
 
 for i in range(n_iterations):
 # 随机生成参数
 params = self.generate_random_params(param_distributions)
 
 print(f"测试随机参数组合 {i+1}/{n_iterations}: {params}")
 
 # 运行回测
 result = self.run_backtest_with_params(params, market_data)
 
 if result and optimization_metric in result['performance_metrics']:
 metric_value = result['performance_metrics'][optimization_metric]
 
 # 记录结果
 optimization_results.append({
 'params': params,
 'metrics': result['performance_metrics'],
 'metric_value': metric_value
 })
 
 # 更新最佳参数
 if metric_value > best_metric:
 best_metric = metric_value
 best_params = params
 self.best_performance = result['performance_metrics']
 
 print(f" 找到更好的参数组合！{optimization_metric}: {metric_value:.4f}")
 
 self.optimization_results = optimization_results
 self.best_params = best_params
 
 return {
 'best_params': best_params,
 'best_metric': best_metric,
 'optimization_results': optimization_results,
 'total_iterations': n_iterations
 }
 
 def generate_random_params(self, param_distributions: Dict[str, Tuple[Any, Any]]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """生成随机参数"""
 params = {}
 
 for param_name, (param_type, param_range) in param_distributions.items():
 if param_type == 'int':
 params[param_name] = np.random.randint(param_range[0], param_range[1] + 1)
 elif param_type == 'float':
 params[param_name] = np.random.uniform(param_range[0], param_range[1])
 elif param_type == 'choice':
 params[param_name] = np.random.choice(param_range)
 
 return params
 
 def bayesian_optimization(self, param_bounds: Dict[str, Tuple[float, float]], 
 n_iterations: int, market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame],
 optimization_metric: str = 'sharpe_ratio') -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """贝叶斯优化"""
 
 try:
 from skopt import gp_minimize
 from skopt.space import Real, Integer
 
 print(f"开始贝叶斯参数优化（{n_iterations}次迭代）...")
 
 # 定义参数空间
 search_space = []
 param_names = []
 
 for param_name, (param_type, bounds) in param_bounds.items():
 param_names.append(param_name)
 
 if param_type == 'int':
 search_space.append(Integer(bounds[0], bounds[1], name=param_name))
 elif param_type == 'float':
 search_space.append(Real(bounds[0], bounds[1], name=param_name))
 
 # 定义目标函数
 def objective_function(params):
 param_dict = dict(zip(param_names, params))
 
 # 运行回测
 result = self.run_backtest_with_params(param_dict, market_data)
 
 if result and optimization_metric in result['performance_metrics']:
 # 贝叶斯优化是求最小值，所以返回负值
 return -result['performance_metrics'][optimization_metric]
 else:
 return 0 # 返回一个较大的值表示失败
 
 # 运行贝叶斯优化
 result = gp_minimize(
 func=objective_function,
 dimensions=search_space,
 n_calls=n_iterations,
 n_initial_points=10,
 random_state=42
 )
 
 # 提取最佳参数
 best_params = dict(zip(param_names, result.x))
 best_metric = -result.fun # 转换回正值
 
 self.best_params = best_params
 
 return {
 'best_params': best_params,
 'best_metric': best_metric,
 'optimization_result': result,
 'total_iterations': n_iterations
 }
 
 except ImportError:
 print("scikit-optimize未安装，请使用pip install scikit-optimize安装")
 return None
 except Exception as e:
 print(f"贝叶斯优化失败: {e}")
 return None

class GeneticAlgorithmOptimizer:
 """遗传算法优化器"""
 
 def __init__(self, population_size: int = 50, generations: int = 20,
 mutation_rate: float = 0.1, crossover_rate: float = 0.8):
 self.population_size = population_size
 self.generations = generations
 self.mutation_rate = mutation_rate
 self.crossover_rate = crossover_rate
 self.population = []
 self.fitness_history = []
 
 def optimize(self, param_bounds: Dict[str, Any], 
 backtest_func, market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame],
 optimization_metric: str = 'sharpe_ratio') -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """遗传算法优化"""
 
 print(f"开始遗传算法优化（种群大小: {self.population_size}, 代数: {self.generations}）...")
 
 # 初始化种群
 self.population = self.initialize_population(param_bounds)
 
 best_individual = None
 best_fitness = -np.inf
 
 for generation in range(self.generations):
 print(f"第 {generation + 1} 代优化...")
 
 # 评估适应度
 fitness_scores = []
 for individual in self.population:
 fitness = self.evaluate_fitness(individual, backtest_func, market_data, optimization_metric)
 fitness_scores.append(fitness)
 
 if fitness > best_fitness:
 best_fitness = fitness
 best_individual = individual.copy()
 
 self.fitness_history.append({
 'generation': generation,
 'best_fitness': best_fitness,
 'avg_fitness': np.mean(fitness_scores)
 })
 
 print(f" 最佳适应度: {best_fitness:.4f}")
 
 # 选择
 selected_population = self.selection(self.population, fitness_scores)
 
 # 交叉
 offspring = self.crossover(selected_population)
 
 # 变异
 mutated_offspring = self.mutation(offspring, param_bounds)
 
 # 更新种群
 self.population = mutated_offspring
 
 return {
 'best_params': best_individual,
 'best_fitness': best_fitness,
 'fitness_history': self.fitness_history
 }
 
 def initialize_population(self, param_bounds: Dict[str, Any]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
 """初始化种群"""
 population = []
 
 for _ in range(self.population_size):
 individual = {}
 
 for param_name, param_config in param_bounds.items():
 if param_config['type'] == 'int':
 individual[param_name] = np.random.randint(
 param_config['bounds'][0], param_config['bounds'][1] + 1
 )
 elif param_config['type'] == 'float':
 individual[param_name] = np.random.uniform(
 param_config['bounds'][0], param_config['bounds'][1]
 )
 elif param_config['type'] == 'choice':
 individual[param_name] = np.random.choice(param_config['choices'])
 
 population.append(individual)
 
 return population
 
 def evaluate_fitness(self, individual: Dict[str, Any], backtest_func,
 market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame], 
 optimization_metric: str) -> float:
 """评估适应度"""
 try:
 # 运行回测
 result = backtest_func(individual, market_data)
 
 if result and optimization_metric in result.get('performance_metrics', {}):
 return result['performance_metrics'][optimization_metric]
 else:
 return -np.inf # 返回负无穷表示失败
 
 except Exception as e:
 print(f"适应度评估失败: {e}")
 return -np.inf
 
 def selection(self, population: List[Dict[str, Any]], 
 fitness_scores: List[float]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
 """选择操作（锦标赛选择）"""
 selected = []
 
 for _ in range(len(population)):
 # 随机选择3个个体进行锦标赛
 tournament_indices = np.random.choice(len(population), 3, replace=False)
 tournament_fitness = [fitness_scores[i] for i in tournament_indices]
 winner_idx = tournament_indices[np.argmax(tournament_fitness)]
 selected.append(population[winner_idx].copy())
 
 return selected
 
 def crossover(self, population: List[Dict[str, Any]]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
 """交叉操作"""
 offspring = []
 
 for i in range(0, len(population), 2):
 parent1 = population[i]
 parent2 = population[i + 1] if i + 1 < len(population) else population[0]
 
 if np.random.random() < self.crossover_rate:
 # 单点交叉
 child1, child2 = self.single_point_crossover(parent1, parent2)
 offspring.extend([child1, child2])
 else:
 offspring.extend([parent1.copy(), parent2.copy()])
 
 return offspring[:len(population)] # 保持种群大小
 
 def single_point_crossover(self, parent1: Dict[str, Any], 
 parent2: Dict[str, Any]) -> Tuple[Dict[str, Any], Dict[str, Any]]:
 """单点交叉"""
 child1 = parent1.copy()
 child2 = parent2.copy()
 
 # 随机选择交叉点
 param_names = list(parent1.keys())
 crossover_point = np.random.randint(1, len(param_names))
 
 # 交换交叉点后的基因
 for i in range(crossover_point, len(param_names)):
 param_name = param_names[i]
 child1[param_name] = parent2[param_name]
 child2[param_name] = parent1[param_name]
 
 return child1, child2
 
 def mutation(self, population: List[Dict[str, Any]], 
 param_bounds: Dict[str, Any]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
 """变异操作"""
 mutated_population = []
 
 for individual in population:
 mutated_individual = individual.copy()
 
 for param_name, param_config in param_bounds.items():
 if np.random.random() < self.mutation_rate:
 # 执行变异
 if param_config['type'] == 'int':
 mutated_individual[param_name] = np.random.randint(
 param_config['bounds'][0], param_config['bounds'][1] + 1
 )
 elif param_config['type'] == 'float':
 mutated_individual[param_name] = np.random.uniform(
 param_config['bounds'][0], param_config['bounds'][1]
 )
 elif param_config['type'] == 'choice':
 mutated_individual[param_name] = np.random.choice(param_config['choices'])
 
 mutated_population.append(mutated_individual)
 
 return mutated_population

class OverfittingDetector:
 """过拟合检测器"""
 
 def __init__(self):
 self.detection_results = {}
 self.validation_metrics = {}
 
 def walk_forward_analysis(self, strategy_class, param_grid: Dict[str, List[Any]],
 market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame],
 train_period: int = 252, test_period: int = 63,
 step_size: int = 21) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """前向分析（Walk-Forward Analysis）"""
 
 print("开始前向分析...")
 
 # 获取所有交易日期
 all_dates = self.get_trading_dates(market_data)
 total_days = len(all_dates)
 
 results = []
 
 # 滑动窗口进行训练和测试
 for start_idx in range(0, total_days - train_period - test_period, step_size):
 # 训练期
 train_start = all_dates[start_idx]
 train_end = all_dates[start_idx + train_period - 1]
 
 # 测试期
 test_start = all_dates[start_idx + train_period]
 test_end = all_dates[min(start_idx + train_period + test_period - 1, total_days - 1)]
 
 print(f"窗口 {len(results) + 1}: 训练期 {train_start.date()} - {train_end.date()}, "
 f"测试期 {test_start.date()} - {test_end.date()}")
 
 # 训练期数据
 train_data = self.get_period_data(market_data, train_start, train_end)
 
 # 测试期数据
 test_data = self.get_period_data(market_data, test_start, test_end)
 
 # 在训练期上优化参数
 optimizer = ParameterOptimizer(strategy_class(BacktestConfig()))
 optimization_result = optimizer.grid_search(param_grid, train_data)
 
 if optimization_result['best_params']:
 # 在测试期上验证
 test_result = self.run_backtest_with_params(
 optimization_result['best_params'], test_data
 )
 
 if test_result:
 results.append({
 'train_period': (train_start, train_end),
 'test_period': (test_start, test_end),
 'best_params': optimization_result['best_params'],
 'train_metrics': optimization_result.get('best_performance', {}),
 'test_metrics': test_result.get('performance_metrics', {}),
 'performance_degradation': self.calculate_performance_degradation(
 optimization_result.get('best_performance', {}),
 test_result.get('performance_metrics', {})
 )
 })
 
 # 分析结果
 analysis = self.analyze_walk_forward_results(results)
 
 return {
 'walk_forward_results': results,
 'analysis': analysis,
 'is_overfitted': analysis.get('is_overfitted', False)
 }
 
 def monte_carlo_permutation_test(self, returns: pd.Series, 
 n_permutations: int = 1000) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """蒙特卡洛置换检验"""
 
 print(f"开始蒙特卡洛置换检验（{n_permutations}次置换）...")
 
 # 计算原始夏普比率
 original_sharpe = self.calculate_sharpe_ratio(returns)
 
 # 生成随机置换
 permuted_sharpes = []
 
 for i in range(n_permutations):
 # 随机打乱收益率序列
 permuted_returns = np.random.permutation(returns.values)
 permuted_series = pd.Series(permuted_returns, index=returns.index)
 
 # 计算置换后的夏普比率
 permuted_sharpe = self.calculate_sharpe_ratio(permuted_series)
 permuted_sharpes.append(permuted_sharpe)
 
 if i % 100 == 0:
 print(f" 完成 {i}/{n_permutations} 次置换")
 
 permuted_sharpes = np.array(permuted_sharpes)
 
 # 计算p值
 p_value = (permuted_sharpes >= original_sharpe).mean()
 
 return {
 'original_sharpe': original_sharpe,
 'mean_permuted_sharpe': np.mean(permuted_sharpes),
 'std_permuted_sharpe': np.std(permuted_sharpes),
 'p_value': p_value,
 'is_significant': p_value < 0.05,
 'n_permutations': n_permutations
 }
 
 def data_mining_bias_test(self, strategy_returns: pd.Series,
 random_strategy_returns: List[pd.Series]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """数据挖掘偏差检验"""
 
 print("开始数据挖掘偏差检验...")
 
 # 计算策略的夏普比率
 strategy_sharpe = self.calculate_sharpe_ratio(strategy_returns)
 
 # 计算随机策略的夏普比率
 random_sharpes = []
 for random_returns in random_strategy_returns:
 random_sharpe = self.calculate_sharpe_ratio(random_returns)
 random_sharpes.append(random_sharpe)
 
 random_sharpes = np.array(random_sharpes)
 
 # 计算排名
 all_sharpes = np.append(random_sharpes, strategy_sharpe)
 rank = np.sum(all_sharpes >= strategy_sharpe)
 percentile_rank = rank / len(all_sharpes)
 
 return {
 'strategy_sharpe': strategy_sharpe,
 'mean_random_sharpe': np.mean(random_sharpes),
 'std_random_sharpe': np.std(random_sharpes),
 'rank': rank,
 'percentile_rank': percentile_rank,
 'is_significant': percentile_rank > 0.95,
 'n_random_strategies': len(random_strategy_returns)
 }
 
 def calculate_sharpe_ratio(self, returns: pd.Series, risk_free_rate: float = 0.03) -> float:
 """计算夏普比率"""
 if returns.std() == 0:
 return 0
 
 excess_return = returns.mean() * 252 - risk_free_rate
 return excess_return / (returns.std() * np.sqrt(252))
 
 def calculate_performance_degradation(self, train_metrics: Dict[str, float],
 test_metrics: Dict[str, float]) -> Dict[str, float]:
 """计算性能衰减"""
 degradation = {}
 
 common_metrics = set(train_metrics.keys()) & set(test_metrics.keys())
 
 for metric in common_metrics:
 train_value = train_metrics.get(metric, 0)
 test_value = test_metrics.get(metric, 0)
 
 if train_value != 0:
 degradation[metric] = (test_value - train_value) / abs(train_value)
 else:
 degradation[metric] = 0
 
 return degradation
 
 def analyze_walk_forward_results(self, results: List[Dict[str, Any]]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """分析前向分析结果"""
 if not results:
 return {}
 
 # 提取测试期指标
 test_sharpes = [r['test_metrics'].get('sharpe_ratio', 0) for r in results]
 train_sharpes = [r['train_metrics'].get('sharpe_ratio', 0) for r in results]
 
 # 计算性能衰减
 degradations = [r['performance_degradation'].get('sharpe_ratio', 0) for r in results]
 
 analysis = {
 'avg_test_sharpe': np.mean(test_sharpes),
 'std_test_sharpe': np.std(test_sharpes),
 'avg_train_sharpe': np.mean(train_sharpes),
 'avg_degradation': np.mean(degradations),
 'min_sharpe': np.min(test_sharpes),
 'max_sharpe': np.max(test_sharpes),
 'sharpe_consistency': np.std(test_sharpes) / abs(np.mean(test_sharpes)) if np.mean(test_sharpes) != 0 else np.inf,
 'is_overfitted': np.mean(degradations) < -0.3 # 平均衰减超过30%认为过拟合
 }
 
 return analysis
 
 def get_trading_dates(self, market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame]) -> List[datetime]:
 """获取交易日历"""
 symbol = list(market_data.keys())[0]
 return market_data[symbol].index.tolist()
 
 def get_period_data(self, market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame], 
 start_date: datetime, end_date: datetime) -> Dict[str, pd.DataFrame]:
 """获取指定期间的数据"""
 period_data = {}
 
 for symbol, data in market_data.items():
 mask = (data.index >= start_date) & (data.index <= end_date)
 period_data[symbol] = data[mask]
 
 return period_data
 
 def run_backtest_with_params(self, params: Dict[str, Any], 
 market_data: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """使用指定参数运行回测（简化实现）"""
 # 这里应该创建策略实例并运行回测
 # 为了简化，返回模拟结果
 return {
 'performance_metrics': {
 'sharpe_ratio': np.random.uniform(0.5, 2.0),
 'total_return': np.random.uniform(0.1, 0.5),
 'max_drawdown': np.random.uniform(-0.3, -0.05)
 }
 }

性能评估指标

class PerformanceEvaluator:
 """性能评估器"""
 
 def __init__(self, risk_free_rate: float = 0.03):
 self.risk_free_rate = risk_free_rate
 self.evaluation_results = {}
 
 def comprehensive_evaluation(self, returns: pd.Series, 
 benchmark_returns: pd.Series = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """综合性能评估"""
 
 evaluation = {}
 
 # 基本统计指标
 evaluation['basic_stats'] = self.calculate_basic_stats(returns)
 
 # 风险调整指标
 evaluation['risk_adjusted'] = self.calculate_risk_adjusted_metrics(returns)
 
 # 回撤分析
 evaluation['drawdown_analysis'] = self.analyze_drawdowns(returns)
 
 # 分布特征
 evaluation['distribution_stats'] = self.analyze_distribution(returns)
 
 # 时间序列分析
 evaluation['time_series_stats'] = self.analyze_time_series(returns)
 
 # 基准比较
 if benchmark_returns is not None:
 evaluation['benchmark_comparison'] = self.compare_with_benchmark(
 returns, benchmark_returns
 )
 
 # 稳定性分析
 evaluation['stability_analysis'] = self.analyze_stability(returns)
 
 self.evaluation_results = evaluation
 
 return evaluation
 
 def calculate_basic_stats(self, returns: pd.Series) -> Dict[str, float]:
 """计算基本统计指标"""
 
 stats = {
 'total_return': (1 + returns).prod() - 1,
 'annual_return': returns.mean() * 252,
 'annual_volatility': returns.std() * np.sqrt(252),
 'skewness': returns.skew(),
 'kurtosis': returns.kurtosis(),
 'min_return': returns.min(),
 'max_return': returns.max(),
 'positive_ratio': (returns > 0).mean(),
 'negative_ratio': (returns < 0).mean(),
 'zero_ratio': (returns == 0).mean()
 }
 
 return stats
 
 def calculate_risk_adjusted_metrics(self, returns: pd.Series) -> Dict[str, float]:
 """计算风险调整指标"""
 
 annual_return = returns.mean() * 252
 annual_vol = returns.std() * np.sqrt(252)
 
 # 夏普比率
 excess_return = annual_return - self.risk_free_rate
 sharpe_ratio = excess_return / annual_vol if annual_vol > 0 else 0
 
 # 索提诺比率
 downside_returns = returns[returns < 0]
 downside_std = downside_returns.std() * np.sqrt(252) if len(downside_returns) > 0 else 0
 sortino_ratio = excess_return / downside_std if downside_std > 0 else np.inf
 
 # 卡尔马比率
 max_drawdown = self.calculate_max_drawdown(returns)
 calmar_ratio = annual_return / abs(max_drawdown) if max_drawdown != 0 else np.inf
 
 # 信息比率（假设等权基准）
 benchmark_return = returns.mean() # 简化处理
 active_return = returns - benchmark_return
 tracking_error = active_return.std() * np.sqrt(252)
 information_ratio = (active_return.mean() * 252) / tracking_error if tracking_error > 0 else 0
 
 return {
 'sharpe_ratio': sharpe_ratio,
 'sortino_ratio': sortino_ratio,
 'calmar_ratio': calmar_ratio,
 'information_ratio': information_ratio,
 'excess_return': excess_return,
 'tracking_error': tracking_error
 }
 
 def analyze_drawdowns(self, returns: pd.Series) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """分析回撤"""
 
 # 计算累计收益
 cumulative = (1 + returns).cumprod()
 
 # 计算运行最大值
 running_max = cumulative.expanding().max()
 
 # 计算回撤
 drawdown = (cumulative - running_max) / running_max
 
 # 最大回撤
 max_drawdown = drawdown.min()
 
 # 回撤持续时间
 drawdown_periods = self.identify_drawdown_periods(drawdown)
 
 # 回撤恢复时间
 recovery_times = self.calculate_recovery_times(drawdown_periods)
 
 return {
 'max_drawdown': max_drawdown,
 'max_drawdown_duration': self.find_max_drawdown_duration(drawdown_periods),
 'avg_drawdown': drawdown[drawdown < 0].mean() if (drawdown < 0).any() else 0,
 'drawdown_volatility': drawdown.std(),
 'drawdown_periods': len(drawdown_periods),
 'avg_recovery_time': np.mean(recovery_times) if recovery_times else 0,
 'max_recovery_time': max(recovery_times) if recovery_times else 0,
 'drawdown_series': drawdown
 }
 
 def identify_drawdown_periods(self, drawdown: pd.Series) -> List[Tuple[int, int]]:
 """识别回撤期"""
 periods = []
 in_drawdown = False
 start_idx = None
 
 for i, dd in enumerate(drawdown):
 if dd < 0 and not in_drawdown:
 start_idx = i
 in_drawdown = True
 elif dd >= 0 and in_drawdown:
 periods.append((start_idx, i))
 in_drawdown = False
 
 # 处理最后一个回撤期
 if in_drawdown:
 periods.append((start_idx, len(drawdown) - 1))
 
 return periods
 
 def calculate_recovery_times(self, drawdown_periods: List[Tuple[int, int]]) -> List[int]:
 """计算恢复时间"""
 recovery_times = []
 
 for start_idx, end_idx in drawdown_periods:
 recovery_time = end_idx - start_idx
 recovery_times.append(recovery_time)
 
 return recovery_times
 
 def find_max_drawdown_duration(self, drawdown_periods: List[Tuple[int, int]]) -> int:
 """找到最长回撤持续时间"""
 if not drawdown_periods:
 return 0
 
 durations = [end - start for start, end in drawdown_periods]
 return max(durations)
 
 def calculate_max_drawdown(self, returns: pd.Series) -> float:
 """计算最大回撤"""
 cumulative = (1 + returns).cumprod()
 running_max = cumulative.expanding().max()
 drawdown = (cumulative - running_max) / running_max
 return drawdown.min()
 
 def analyze_distribution(self, returns: pd.Series) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """分析收益分布"""
 
 # 正态性检验
 from scipy import stats
 
 # Jarque-Bera检验
 jb_stat, jb_pvalue = stats.jarque_bera(returns.dropna())
 
 # Shapiro-Wilk检验
 if len(returns) <= 5000: # Shapiro-Wilk检验对样本大小有限制
 sw_stat, sw_pvalue = stats.shapiro(returns.dropna())
 else:
 sw_stat, sw_pvalue = None, None
 
 # 分位数分析
 quantiles = [0.01, 0.05, 0.1, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 0.9, 0.95, 0.99]
 quantile_values = returns.quantile(quantiles)
 
 # VaR计算
 var_95 = returns.quantile(0.05)
 var_99 = returns.quantile(0.01)
 
 # CVaR计算
 cvar_95 = returns[returns <= var_95].mean()
 cvar_99 = returns[returns <= var_99].mean()
 
 return {
 'jb_statistic': jb_stat,
 'jb_pvalue': jb_pvalue,
 'sw_statistic': sw_stat,
 'sw_pvalue': sw_pvalue,
 'is_normal': jb_pvalue > 0.05,
 'quantiles': dict(zip(quantiles, quantile_values)),
 'var_95': var_95,
 'var_99': var_99,
 'cvar_95': cvar_95,
 'cvar_99': cvar_99,
 'tail_ratio': abs(quantile_values[0.05]) / abs(quantile_values[0.95]) if quantile_values[0.95] != 0 else np.inf
 }
 
 def analyze_time_series(self, returns: pd.Series) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """时间序列分析"""
 
 from scipy import stats
 
 # 自相关检验
 from statsmodels.stats.diagnostic import acorr_ljungbox
 
 try:
 # Ljung-Box检验（检验自相关）
 lb_test = acorr_ljungbox(returns.dropna(), lags=10, return_df=True)
 lb_stat = lb_test['lb_stat'].iloc[-1]
 lb_pvalue = lb_test['lb_pvalue'].iloc[-1]
 except:
 lb_stat, lb_pvalue = None, None
 
 # 单位根检验（ADF检验）
 from statsmodels.tsa.stattools import adfuller
 adf_result = adfuller(returns.dropna())
 
 # 计算滚动统计量
 rolling_stats = self.calculate_rolling_stats(returns)
 
 return {
 'lb_statistic': lb_stat,
 'lb_pvalue': lb_pvalue,
 'has_autocorrelation': lb_pvalue < 0.05 if lb_pvalue else None,
 'adf_statistic': adf_result[0],
 'adf_pvalue': adf_result[1],
 'is_stationary': adf_result[1] < 0.05,
 'rolling_stats': rolling_stats
 }
 
 def calculate_rolling_stats(self, returns: pd.Series, window: int = 60) -> Dict[str, pd.Series]:
 """计算滚动统计量"""
 
 rolling_stats = {
 'rolling_mean': returns.rolling(window=window).mean(),
 'rolling_std': returns.rolling(window=window).std(),
 'rolling_sharpe': self.calculate_rolling_sharpe(returns, window),
 'rolling_skewness': returns.rolling(window=window).skew(),
 'rolling_kurtosis': returns.rolling(window=window).kurt()
 }
 
 return rolling_stats
 
 def calculate_rolling_sharpe(self, returns: pd.Series, window: int) -> pd.Series:
 """计算滚动夏普比率"""
 rolling_return = returns.rolling(window=window).mean() * 252
 rolling_vol = returns.rolling(window=window).std() * np.sqrt(252)
 
 excess_return = rolling_return - self.risk_free_rate
 rolling_sharpe = excess_return / rolling_vol
 
 return rolling_sharpe
 
 def compare_with_benchmark(self, strategy_returns: pd.Series, 
 benchmark_returns: pd.Series) -> Dict[str, float]:
 """与基准比较"""
 
 # 对齐数据
 aligned_data = pd.concat([strategy_returns, benchmark_returns], axis=1).dropna()
 strategy_aligned = aligned_data.iloc[:, 0]
 benchmark_aligned = aligned_data.iloc[:, 1]
 
 # 计算Alpha和Beta
 covariance = np.cov(strategy_aligned, benchmark_aligned)[0, 1]
 benchmark_variance = np.var(benchmark_aligned)
 beta = covariance / benchmark_variance if benchmark_variance > 0 else 0
 
 strategy_annual = strategy_aligned.mean() * 252
 benchmark_annual = benchmark_aligned.mean() * 252
 alpha = strategy_annual - (self.risk_free_rate + beta * (benchmark_annual - self.risk_free_rate))
 
 # 跟踪误差
 tracking_error = (strategy_aligned - benchmark_aligned).std() * np.sqrt(252)
 
 # 信息比率
 active_return = (strategy_aligned - benchmark_aligned).mean() * 252
 information_ratio = active_return / tracking_error if tracking_error > 0 else 0
 
 # 相关性
 correlation = strategy_aligned.corr(benchmark_aligned)
 
 return {
 'alpha': alpha,
 'beta': beta,
 'tracking_error': tracking_error,
 'information_ratio': information_ratio,
 'correlation': correlation,
 'active_return': active_return
 }
 
 def analyze_stability(self, returns: pd.Series) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 """稳定性分析"""
 
 # 分段时间分析
 n_periods = 4
 period_length = len(returns) // n_periods
 
 period_sharpes = []
 period_returns = []
 
 for i in range(n_periods):
 start_idx = i * period_length
 end_idx = min((i + 1) * period_length, len(returns))
 period_returns_series = returns.iloc[start_idx:end_idx]
 
 if len(period_returns_series) > 0:
 period_sharpe = self.calculate_sharpe_ratio(period_returns_series)
 period_return = period_returns_series.mean() * 252
 
 period_sharpes.append(period_sharpe)
 period_returns.append(period_return)
 
 # 计算稳定性指标
 sharpe_stability = np.std(period_sharpes) / abs(np.mean(period_sharpes)) if np.mean(period_sharpes) != 0 else np.inf
 return_stability = np.std(period_returns) / abs(np.mean(period_returns)) if np.mean(period_returns) != 0 else np.inf
 
 # 计算Hurst指数（长期记忆性）
 hurst_exponent = self.calculate_hurst_exponent(returns)
 
 return {
 'period_sharpes': period_sharpes,
 'period_returns': period_returns,
 'sharpe_stability': sharpe_stability,
 'return_stability': return_stability,
 'hurst_exponent': hurst_exponent,
 'has_long_memory': hurst_exponent > 0.5,
 'is_stable': sharpe_stability < 0.5 and return_stability < 0.5
 }
 
 def calculate_hurst_exponent(self, returns: pd.Series, max_lag: int = 100) -> float:
 """计算Hurst指数"""
 
 lags = range(2, min(max_lag, len(returns) // 4))
 tau = [np.sqrt(np.std(np.subtract(returns[lag:], returns[:-lag]))) for lag in lags]
 
 if len(tau) < 2:
 return 0.5
 
 # 线性回归拟合
 poly = np.polyfit(np.log(lags), np.log(tau), 1)
 return poly[0] * 2.0

item.title: 宏观分析第9讲：政治因素对股市的影响
item.description:
目录

  • 政治因素分析的总体框架
  • 地缘政治层面：冲突 → 避险 → 通胀的传导链条
    • 冲突性质与影响程度的量化评估
    • 避险资产的轮动规律与配置时机
    • 军工产业链的投资机会识别
  • 国内政治层面：政权 → 政策 → 信心的传导机制
    • 政治周期与股市表现的统计规律
    • 社会稳定性与风险溢价的关系
  • 国际政治层面：格局 → 秩序 → 利益的传导路径
    • 大国博弈与板块轮动的对应关系
    • 国际规则变化与投资机会识别
  • 法律制度层面：规则 → 预期 → 估值的长期传导
    • 监管政策周期与估值溢价变化
    • 产权保护与市场信心建设
  • 政治风险量化评估与投资组合管理
    • 政治风险指数构建与应用
    • 政治事件的交易策略制定

政治因素分析的总体框架

在全球化深入发展、地缘政治格局深刻演变的当下，政治因素已成为影响股市走势的重要变量。投资者若想建立一套可落地的政治风险分析体系，需要遵循"地缘政治 → 国内政治 → 国际政治 → 法律制度"的四级递进框架：

1、用地缘政治冲突判断市场风险偏好与避险需求；

2、用政权稳定性与政策连续性评估制度风险；

3、用国际政治格局变化识别受益与受损板块；

4、用法律制度变迁把握长期投资机会与风险；

地缘政治层面：冲突 → 避险 → 通胀的传导链条

地缘政治研究的核心在于把握"冲突 → 避险 → 通胀"这一传导链，通过系统分析冲突的性质、范围、持续时间，预判其对市场的冲击程度和投资机会分布。

冲突性质与影响程度的量化评估

地缘政治冲突对股市的影响呈现明显的差异化特征，需要建立多维度的评估框架。按照冲突性质划分，可建立"影响系数"模型：全面战争（影响系数0.8-1.0）、局部军事冲突（0.5-0.8）、代理人战争（0.3-0.5）、经济制裁（0.2-0.4）、外交争端（0.1-0.3）。

冲突范围维度上，全球性冲突（如世界大战）将导致系统性风险，VIX指数通常飙升至40以上，黄金价格上涨15-25%；区域性冲突（如中东战争）主要影响相关板块和地区市场，能源、军工板块相对受益；双边冲突（如贸易摩擦）影响相对有限，主要冲击直接相关的贸易和投资领域。

持续时间分析同样关键。短期冲突（1-3个月）往往造成市场过度反应，提供逆向投资机会；中期冲突（3-12个月）将实质性影响企业盈利，需要重新评估估值；长期冲突（1年以上）将改变产业链格局，催生新的投资机会和风险。

避险资产的轮动规律与配置时机

地缘政治风险上升时，避险资产呈现明显的轮动特征。黄金作为传统避险资产，在冲突初期（T+0至T+7日）通常上涨5-8%，但需要注意美元指数的相对强弱。当美元指数同步走强时，黄金涨幅可能受限；当美元走弱时，黄金涨幅可能放大至10-15%。

美国国债的避险功能体现在收益率的快速下行。10年期美债收益率在重大地缘冲突发生后平均下降30-50个基点，但需要关注美联储的政策立场。在通胀高企背景下，美联储可能抑制收益率下行空间。瑞士法郎、日元等避险货币通常升值3-5%，但日本作为资源进口国，在能源价格上涨周期中避险属性可能弱化。

原油价格的反应最为复杂。供应中断风险推高油价，但需求下降预期又抑制涨幅。需要综合评估：冲突是否涉及主要产油国、战略储备释放规模、替代供应能力。历史数据显示，中东地区冲突平均推高油价15-25%，但若涉及霍尔木兹海峡等关键通道，涨幅可能达到40-60%。

军工产业链的投资机会识别

地缘政治紧张局势直接利好军工产业链，但需要区分不同细分领域的受益程度。主机厂（如洛克希德·马丁、波音防务）直接受益于军备采购增加，订单能见度提升，估值溢价扩大；零部件供应商（如雷神技术、诺斯罗普·格鲁曼）受益于产业链需求传导，但时滞较长；军工电子（如L3哈里斯、霍尼韦尔）受益于装备升级需求，技术壁垒高，盈利弹性大。

学习目标

通过本讲的学习，你将掌握：

  • 量化策略的基本框架和开发流程

  • 多因子策略开发
  • 事件驱动策略设计

量化策略基础概念

什么是量化策略

量化策略是利用数学模型和计算机算法进行投资决策的方法。它将交易逻辑转化为可量化的规则，通过历史数据回测验证策略有效性，并在实盘中自动执行。

class QuantStrategy:
 """量化策略基类"""
 
 def __init__(self, name, description=""):
 self.name = name
 self.description = description
 self.parameters = {}
 self.signals = []
 self.positions = []
 self.performance_metrics = {}
 
 def generate_signals(self, data):
 """生成交易信号"""
 raise NotImplementedError("子类必须实现此方法")
 
 def calculate_position_size(self, signal, portfolio_value, risk_per_trade=0.02):
 """计算仓位大小"""
 raise NotImplementedError("子类必须实现此方法")
 
 def backtest(self, data, initial_capital=100000):
 """策略回测"""
 raise NotImplementedError("子类必须实现此方法")
 
 def evaluate_performance(self, returns):
 """评估策略表现"""
 raise NotImplementedError("子类必须实现此方法")

class StrategyDevelopmentPipeline:
 """策略开发管道"""
 
 def __init__(self):
 self.steps = [
 'idea_generation', # 策略想法生成
 'data_preparation', # 数据准备
 'signal_generation', # 信号生成
 'risk_management', # 风险管理
 'backtesting', # 回测
 'optimization', # 优化
 'validation', # 验证
 'deployment' # 部署
 ]
 self.current_step = 0
 self.results = {}
 
 def run_step(self, step_name, **kwargs):
 """运行指定步骤"""
 if step_name == 'idea_generation':
 return self.generate_ideas(**kwargs)
 elif step_name == 'data_preparation':
 return self.prepare_data(**kwargs)
 elif step_name == 'signal_generation':
 return self.generate_signals(**kwargs)
 # ... 其他步骤
 
 def generate_ideas(self, market_analysis, technical_factors, fundamental_factors):
 """生成策略想法"""
 ideas = []
 
 # 基于技术分析的想法
 for factor in technical_factors:
 ideas.append({
 'type': 'technical',
 'factor': factor,
 'logic': f"当{factor}显示超买时卖出，超卖时买入"
 })
 
 # 基于基本面分析的想法
 for factor in fundamental_factors:
 ideas.append({
 'type': 'fundamental',
 'factor': factor,
 'logic': f"基于{factor}的估值策略"
 })
 
 return ideas

from abc import ABC, abstractmethod
from dataclasses import dataclass
from typing import List, Dict, Any
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from datetime import datetime

@dataclass
class MarketData:
 """市场数据结构"""
 symbol: str
 timestamp: datetime
 open: float
 high: float
 low: float
 close: float
 volume: int
 
@dataclass
class Signal:
 """交易信号结构"""
 symbol: str
 timestamp: datetime
 signal_type: str # 'BUY', 'SELL', 'HOLD'
 strength: float # 信号强度
 price: float
 quantity: int = 0
 metadata: Dict[str, Any] = None

class StrategyBase(ABC):
 """策略基类"""
 
 def __init__(self, name: str, symbols: List[str]):
 self.name = name
 self.symbols = symbols
 self.signals: List[Signal] = []
 self.positions: Dict[str, int] = {symbol: 0 for symbol in symbols}
 self.cash = 100000 # 初始资金
 self.portfolio_value = 100000
 self.is_active = False
 self.parameters = {}
 
 @abstractmethod
 def on_market_data(self, data: MarketData):
 """处理市场数据"""
 pass
 
 @abstractmethod
 def generate_signal(self, data: MarketData) -> Signal:
 """生成交易信号"""
 pass
 
 def on_signal(self, signal: Signal):
 """处理交易信号"""
 self.signals.append(signal)
 
 # 执行交易逻辑
 if signal.signal_type == 'BUY':
 self.execute_buy(signal)
 elif signal.signal_type == 'SELL':
 self.execute_sell(signal)
 
 def execute_buy(self, signal: Signal):
 """执行买入"""
 max_quantity = int(self.cash / signal.price)
 if max_quantity > 0:
 quantity = min(signal.quantity, max_quantity) if signal.quantity > 0 else max_quantity
 cost = quantity * signal.price
 self.cash -= cost
 self.positions[signal.symbol] += quantity
 
 print(f"买入 {signal.symbol}: {quantity} 股 @ {signal.price}")
 
 def execute_sell(self, signal: Signal):
 """执行卖出"""
 current_position = self.positions[signal.symbol]
 if current_position > 0:
 quantity = min(signal.quantity, current_position) if signal.quantity > 0 else current_position
 revenue = quantity * signal.price
 self.cash += revenue
 self.positions[signal.symbol] -= quantity
 
 print(f"卖出 {signal.symbol}: {quantity} 股 @ {signal.price}")
 
 def update_portfolio_value(self, current_prices: Dict[str, float]):
 """更新组合价值"""
 total_value = self.cash
 for symbol, position in self.positions.items():
 if position > 0 and symbol in current_prices:
 total_value += position * current_prices[symbol]
 
 self.portfolio_value = total_value
 return total_value

class TechnicalStrategy(StrategyBase):
 """基于技术指标的策略"""
 
 def __init__(self, name: str, symbols: List[str]):
 super().__init__(name, symbols)
 self.indicators = {}
 self.lookback_period = 20
 self.parameters = {
 'rsi_period': 14,
 'rsi_overbought': 70,
 'rsi_oversold': 30,
 'ma_short': 5,
 'ma_long': 20,
 'volume_threshold': 1.5
 }
 
 def on_market_data(self, data: MarketData):
 """处理市场数据"""
 # 更新技术指标
 self.update_indicators(data)
 
 # 生成交易信号
 signal = self.generate_signal(data)
 
 # 如果信号有效，执行交易
 if signal and signal.signal_type != 'HOLD':
 self.on_signal(signal)
 
 def update_indicators(self, data: MarketData):
 """更新技术指标"""
 symbol = data.symbol
 
 if symbol not in self.indicators:
 self.indicators[symbol] = {
 'prices': [],
 'volumes': [],
 'timestamps': []
 }
 
 # 存储历史数据
 self.indicators[symbol]['prices'].append(data.close)
 self.indicators[symbol]['volumes'].append(data.volume)
 self.indicators[symbol]['timestamps'].append(data.timestamp)
 
 # 保持数据长度
 if len(self.indicators[symbol]['prices']) > self.lookback_period * 2:
 self.indicators[symbol]['prices'].pop(0)
 self.indicators[symbol]['volumes'].pop(0)
 self.indicators[symbol]['timestamps'].pop(0)
 
 def calculate_rsi(self, prices: List[float], period: int = 14) -> float:
 """计算RSI指标"""
 if len(prices) < period + 1:
 return 50.0
 
 deltas = np.diff(prices[-(period + 1):])
 gains = np.where(deltas > 0, deltas, 0)
 losses = np.where(deltas < 0, -deltas, 0)
 
 avg_gain = np.mean(gains)
 avg_loss = np.mean(losses)
 
 if avg_loss == 0:
 return 100.0
 
 rs = avg_gain / avg_loss
 rsi = 100 - (100 / (1 + rs))
 
 return rsi
 
 def calculate_moving_average(self, prices: List[float], window: int) -> float:
 """计算移动平均线"""
 if len(prices) < window:
 return prices[-1]
 
 return np.mean(prices[-window:])
 
 def calculate_bollinger_bands(self, prices: List[float], window: int = 20, num_std: int = 2):
 """计算布林带"""
 if len(prices) < window:
 return prices[-1], prices[-1], prices[-1]
 
 ma = np.mean(prices[-window:])
 std = np.std(prices[-window:])
 
 upper_band = ma + (std * num_std)
 lower_band = ma - (std * num_std)
 
 return upper_band, ma, lower_band
 
 def generate_signal(self, data: MarketData) -> Signal:
 """生成交易信号"""
 symbol = data.symbol
 
 if symbol not in self.indicators:
 return Signal(symbol, data.timestamp, 'HOLD', 0.0, data.close)
 
 prices = self.indicators[symbol]['prices']
 volumes = self.indicators[symbol]['volumes']
 
 if len(prices) < max(self.parameters['ma_long'], self.parameters['rsi_period']):
 return Signal(symbol, data.timestamp, 'HOLD', 0.0, data.close)
 
 # 计算技术指标
 rsi = self.calculate_rsi(prices, self.parameters['rsi_period'])
 ma_short = self.calculate_moving_average(prices, self.parameters['ma_short'])
 ma_long = self.calculate_moving_average(prices, self.parameters['ma_long'])
 
 upper_band, middle_band, lower_band = self.calculate_bollinger_bands(prices)
 
 # 成交量分析
 avg_volume = np.mean(volumes[-10:])
 volume_ratio = volumes[-1] / avg_volume if avg_volume > 0 else 1.0
 
 # 生成信号
 signal_type = 'HOLD'
 strength = 0.0
 metadata = {
 'rsi': rsi,
 'ma_short': ma_short,
 'ma_long': ma_long,
 'bb_upper': upper_band,
 'bb_lower': lower_band,
 'volume_ratio': volume_ratio
 }
 
 # RSI策略
 if rsi < self.parameters['rsi_oversold']:
 signal_type = 'BUY'
 strength = (self.parameters['rsi_oversold'] - rsi) / self.parameters['rsi_oversold']
 elif rsi > self.parameters['rsi_overbought']:
 signal_type = 'SELL'
 strength = (rsi - self.parameters['rsi_overbought']) / (100 - self.parameters['rsi_overbought'])
 
 # 均线策略
 if ma_short > ma_long and prices[-1] > ma_short:
 if signal_type == 'HOLD':
 signal_type = 'BUY'
 strength = 0.5
 else:
 strength += 0.3
 elif ma_short < ma_long and prices[-1] < ma_short:
 if signal_type == 'HOLD':
 signal_type = 'SELL'
 strength = 0.5
 else:
 strength += 0.3
 
 # 布林带策略
 if prices[-1] < lower_band:
 if signal_type == 'HOLD':
 signal_type = 'BUY'
 strength = 0.7
 else:
 strength += 0.2
 elif prices[-1] > upper_band:
 if signal_type == 'HOLD':
 signal_type = 'SELL'
 strength = 0.7
 else:
 strength += 0.2
 
 # 成交量确认
 if volume_ratio > self.parameters['volume_threshold']:
 strength *= 1.2 # 增强信号强度
 
 return Signal(
 symbol=symbol,
 timestamp=data.timestamp,
 signal_type=signal_type,
 strength=min(strength, 1.0),
 price=data.close,
 metadata=metadata
 )

class TrendIndicators:
 """趋势指标"""
 
 @staticmethod
 def sma(prices: np.ndarray, window: int) -> np.ndarray:
 """简单移动平均线"""
 return np.convolve(prices, np.ones(window)/window, mode='valid')
 
 @staticmethod
 def ema(prices: np.ndarray, window: int) -> np.ndarray:
 """指数移动平均线"""
 alpha = 2 / (window + 1)
 ema_values = np.zeros_like(prices)
 ema_values[0] = prices[0]
 
 for i in range(1, len(prices)):
 ema_values[i] = alpha * prices[i] + (1 - alpha) * ema_values[i-1]
 
 return ema_values
 
 @staticmethod
 def macd(prices: np.ndarray, fast: int = 12, slow: int = 26, signal: int = 9):
 """MACD指标"""
 ema_fast = TrendIndicators.ema(prices, fast)
 ema_slow = TrendIndicators.ema(prices, slow)
 
 # 确保数组长度一致
 min_len = min(len(ema_fast), len(ema_slow))
 ema_fast = ema_fast[-min_len:]
 ema_slow = ema_slow[-min_len:]
 
 macd_line = ema_fast - ema_slow
 signal_line = TrendIndicators.ema(macd_line, signal)
 histogram = macd_line[-len(signal_line):] - signal_line
 
 return {
 'macd': macd_line,
 'signal': signal_line,
 'histogram': histogram
 }
 
 @staticmethod
 def adx(high: np.ndarray, low: np.ndarray, close: np.ndarray, window: int = 14) -> np.ndarray:
 """平均趋向指数"""
 # 计算真实波幅(TR)
 tr1 = high - low
 tr2 = np.abs(high - np.roll(close, 1))
 tr3 = np.abs(low - np.roll(close, 1))
 tr = np.maximum(np.maximum(tr1, tr2), tr3)
 
 # 计算方向运动(DM)
 up_move = high - np.roll(high, 1)
 down_move = np.roll(low, 1) - low
 
 plus_dm = np.where((up_move > down_move) & (up_move > 0), up_move, 0)
 minus_dm = np.where((down_move > up_move) & (down_move > 0), down_move, 0)
 
 # 计算平滑值
 tr_smooth = np.convolve(tr, np.ones(window)/window, mode='valid')
 plus_dm_smooth = np.convolve(plus_dm, np.ones(window)/window, mode='valid')
 minus_dm_smooth = np.convolve(minus_dm, np.ones(window)/window, mode='valid')
 
 # 计算方向指标
 plus_di = 100 * plus_dm_smooth / tr_smooth
 minus_di = 100 * minus_dm_smooth / tr_smooth
 
 # 计算ADX
 dx = 100 * np.abs(plus_di - minus_di) / (plus_di + minus_di)
 adx = TrendIndicators.ema(dx, window)
 
 return adx

class MomentumIndicators:
 """动量指标"""
 
 @staticmethod
 def rsi(prices: np.ndarray, window: int = 14) -> np.ndarray:
 """相对强弱指标"""
 deltas = np.diff(prices)
 gains = np.where(deltas > 0, deltas, 0)
 losses = np.where(deltas < 0, -deltas, 0)
 
 # 计算平均收益和损失
 avg_gains = np.convolve(gains, np.ones(window)/window, mode='valid')
 avg_losses = np.convolve(losses, np.ones(window)/window, mode='valid')
 
 # 计算RSI
 rs = avg_gains / (avg_losses + 1e-10) # 避免除零
 rsi = 100 - (100 / (1 + rs))
 
 return rsi
 
 @staticmethod
 def stochastic(high: np.ndarray, low: np.ndarray, close: np.ndarray, 
 window: int = 14, smooth_window: int = 3):
 """随机指标"""
 # 计算最近window期间的最低点和最高点
 lowest_low = np.array([np.min(low[i-window+1:i+1]) if i >= window-1 else np.nan 
 for i in range(len(low))])
 highest_high = np.array([np.max(high[i-window+1:i+1]) if i >= window-1 else np.nan 
 for i in range(len(high))])
 
 # 计算%K
 k_percent = 100 * ((close - lowest_low) / (highest_high - lowest_low + 1e-10))
 
 # 计算%D（%K的移动平均线）
 d_percent = np.convolve(k_percent, np.ones(smooth_window)/smooth_window, mode='valid')
 
 return {
 'k': k_percent,
 'd': d_percent
 }
 
 @staticmethod
 def williams_r(high: np.ndarray, low: np.ndarray, close: np.ndarray, window: int = 14) -> np.ndarray:
 """威廉指标"""
 highest_high = np.array([np.max(high[i-window+1:i+1]) if i >= window-1 else np.nan 
 for i in range(len(high))])
 lowest_low = np.array([np.min(low[i-window+1:i+1]) if i >= window-1 else np.nan 
 for i in range(len(low))])
 
 williams_r = -100 * ((highest_high - close) / (highest_high - lowest_low + 1e-10))
 
 return williams_r
 
 @staticmethod
 def cci(high: np.ndarray, low: np.ndarray, close: np.ndarray, window: int = 20) -> np.ndarray:
 """商品通道指标"""
 # 典型价格
 typical_price = (high + low + close) / 3
 
 # 移动平均
 ma = np.convolve(typical_price, np.ones(window)/window, mode='valid')
 
 # 平均绝对偏差
 abs_dev = np.array([np.mean(np.abs(typical_price[i-window+1:i+1] - ma[i-window+1]) if i >= window-1 else np.nan 
 for i in range(len(typical_price))])
 
 # CCI计算
 cci = (typical_price[window-1:] - ma) / (0.015 * abs_dev[window-1:] + 1e-10)
 
 return cci

class VolatilityIndicators:
 """波动率指标"""
 
 @staticmethod
 def bollinger_bands(prices: np.ndarray, window: int = 20, num_std: int = 2):
 """布林带"""
 ma = np.convolve(prices, np.ones(window)/window, mode='valid')
 std = np.array([np.std(prices[i-window+1:i+1]) if i >= window-1 else np.nan 
 for i in range(len(prices))])
 
 upper_band = ma + (std[window-1:] * num_std)
 lower_band = ma - (std[window-1:] * num_std)
 
 return {
 'upper': upper_band,
 'middle': ma,
 'lower': lower_band,
 'bandwidth': (upper_band - lower_band) / ma
 }
 
 @staticmethod
 def atr(high: np.ndarray, low: np.ndarray, close: np.ndarray, window: int = 14) -> np.ndarray:
 """平均真实波幅"""
 # 计算真实波幅
 tr1 = high - low
 tr2 = np.abs(high - np.roll(close, 1))
 tr3 = np.abs(low - np.roll(close, 1))
 tr = np.maximum(np.maximum(tr1, tr2), tr3)
 
 # 计算ATR（使用指数移动平均）
 atr_values = np.zeros_like(tr)
 atr_values[0] = tr[0]
 
 alpha = 1 / window
 for i in range(1, len(tr)):
 atr_values[i] = alpha * tr[i] + (1 - alpha) * atr_values[i-1]
 
 return atr_values
 
 @staticmethod
 def volatility(prices: np.ndarray, window: int = 20) -> np.ndarray:
 """历史波动率"""
 returns = np.diff(np.log(prices))
 volatility = np.array([np.std(returns[i-window+1:i+1]) * np.sqrt(252) if i >= window-1 else np.nan 
 for i in range(len(returns))])
 
 return volatility

class VolumeIndicators:
 """成交量指标"""
 
 @staticmethod
 def obv(close: np.ndarray, volume: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
 """能量潮指标"""
 obv = np.zeros_like(close)
 obv[0] = volume[0]
 
 for i in range(1, len(close)):
 if close[i] > close[i-1]:
 obv[i] = obv[i-1] + volume[i]
 elif close[i] < close[i-1]:
 obv[i] = obv[i-1] - volume[i]
 else:
 obv[i] = obv[i-1]
 
 return obv
 
 @staticmethod
 def vwap(high: np.ndarray, low: np.ndarray, close: np.ndarray, volume: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
 """成交量加权平均价格"""
 typical_price = (high + low + close) / 3
 cumulative_tp_volume = np.cumsum(typical_price * volume)
 cumulative_volume = np.cumsum(volume)
 
 vwap = cumulative_tp_volume / (cumulative_volume + 1e-10)
 
 return vwap
 
 @staticmethod
 def volume_rate_of_change(volume: np.ndarray, window: int = 12) -> np.ndarray:
 """成交量变化率"""
 roc = np.zeros_like(volume, dtype=float)
 
 for i in range(window, len(volume)):
 if volume[i-window] != 0:
 roc[i] = (volume[i] - volume[i-window]) / volume[i-window] * 100
 
 return roc

class SignalGenerator:
 """信号生成器"""
 
 def __init__(self):
 self.signals = []
 self.signal_rules = {}
 
 def add_rule(self, name: str, condition_func, action_func, priority: int = 1):
 """添加信号规则"""
 self.signal_rules[name] = {
 'condition': condition_func,
 'action': action_func,
 'priority': priority,
 'enabled': True
 }
 
 def generate_signals(self, data: pd.DataFrame, current_position: int = 0) -> List[Signal]:
 """生成交易信号"""
 signals = []
 
 for rule_name, rule in self.signal_rules.items():
 if not rule['enabled']:
 continue
 
 # 检查条件
 if rule['condition'](data, current_position):
 # 执行动作
 signal = rule['action'](data, current_position)
 if signal:
 signal.metadata = signal.metadata or {}
 signal.metadata['rule_name'] = rule_name
 signal.metadata['priority'] = rule['priority']
 signals.append(signal)
 
 # 按优先级排序
 signals.sort(key=lambda x: x.metadata.get('priority', 1), reverse=True)
 
 return signals
 
 def create_momentum_signals(self, data: pd.DataFrame):
 """创建动量信号"""
 # RSI信号
 def rsi_condition(data, position):
 if 'rsi' not in data.columns:
 return False
 current_rsi = data['rsi'].iloc[-1]
 return current_rsi < 30 and position == 0 # 超卖且空仓
 
 def rsi_action(data, position):
 return Signal(
 symbol=data.index[-1],
 timestamp=pd.Timestamp.now(),
 signal_type='BUY',
 strength=0.8,
 price=data['close'].iloc[-1],
 quantity=100
 )
 
 self.add_rule('rsi_oversold', rsi_condition, rsi_action, priority=2)
 
 # MACD信号
 def macd_condition(data, position):
 if 'macd' not in data.columns or 'macd_signal' not in data.columns:
 return False
 
 macd = data['macd'].iloc[-1]
 signal = data['macd_signal'].iloc[-1]
 macd_prev = data['macd'].iloc[-2]
 signal_prev = data['macd_signal'].iloc[-2]
 
 # MACD金叉
 return (macd > signal and macd_prev <= signal_prev and position == 0)
 
 def macd_action(data, position):
 return Signal(
 symbol=data.index[-1],
 timestamp=pd.Timestamp.now(),
 signal_type='BUY',
 strength=0.7,
 price=data['close'].iloc[-1],
 quantity=100
 )
 
 self.add_rule('macd_golden_cross', macd_condition, macd_action, priority=1)

class MultiTimeframeSignalGenerator:
 """多时间框架信号生成器"""
 
 def __init__(self):
 self.timeframes = ['1min', '5min', '15min', '1h', '1d']
 self.signals_by_timeframe = {}
 self.combined_signals = []
 
 def generate_multi_timeframe_signals(self, data_dict: Dict[str, pd.DataFrame]):
 """生成多时间框架信号"""
 
 for timeframe, data in data_dict.items():
 signal_gen = SignalGenerator()
 
 # 为不同时间框架设置不同的参数
 if timeframe == '1min':
 # 高频交易信号
 signal_gen.add_rule('price_spike', 
 lambda d, p: abs(d['close'].pct_change().iloc[-1]) > 0.002,
 lambda d, p: Signal(d.index[-1], pd.Timestamp.now(), 'BUY', 0.5, d['close'].iloc[-1], 10),
 priority=1)
 
 elif timeframe == '1d':
 # 日线信号
 signal_gen.add_rule('trend_following',
 lambda d, p: d['close'].iloc[-1] > d['sma_20'].iloc[-1] and p == 0,
 lambda d, p: Signal(d.index[-1], pd.Timestamp.now(), 'BUY', 0.8, d['close'].iloc[-1], 100),
 priority=3)
 
 # 生成信号
 signals = signal_gen.generate_signals(data)
 self.signals_by_timeframe[timeframe] = signals
 
 # 合并信号
 self.combined_signals = self.combine_signals()
 
 return self.combined_signals
 
 def combine_signals(self) -> List[Signal]:
 """合并不同时间框架的信号"""
 combined = []
 
 # 简单多数投票
 buy_votes = 0
 sell_votes = 0
 total_signals = 0
 
 for timeframe, signals in self.signals_by_timeframe.items():
 for signal in signals:
 total_signals += 1
 if signal.signal_type == 'BUY':
 buy_votes += signal.strength
 elif signal.signal_type == 'SELL':
 sell_votes += signal.strength
 
 # 生成最终信号
 if buy_votes > sell_votes and buy_votes > 0.5:
 final_signal = Signal(
 symbol='PORTFOLIO',
 timestamp=pd.Timestamp.now(),
 signal_type='BUY',
 strength=buy_votes / total_signals if total_signals > 0 else 0,
 price=0.0,
 quantity=100
 )
 combined.append(final_signal)
 elif sell_votes > buy_votes and sell_votes > 0.5:
 final_signal = Signal(
 symbol='PORTFOLIO',
 timestamp=pd.Timestamp.now(),
 signal_type='SELL',
 strength=sell_votes / total_signals if total_signals > 0 else 0,
 price=0.0,
 quantity=100
 )
 combined.append(final_signal)
 
 return combined

class RiskManager:
 """风险管理器"""
 
 def __init__(self, max_position_size: float = 0.1, max_portfolio_risk: float = 0.02):
 self.max_position_size = max_position_size # 最大仓位比例
 self.max_portfolio_risk = max_portfolio_risk # 最大组合风险
 self.current_exposure = 0.0
 self.stop_losses = {}
 self.position_limits = {}
 
 def calculate_position_size(self, signal: Signal, portfolio_value: float, 
 current_price: float, volatility: float = None) -> int:
 """计算仓位大小"""
 
 # 基于风险的资金管理
 risk_per_trade = self.max_portfolio_risk * portfolio_value
 
 # 如果没有波动率数据，使用固定止损
 if volatility is None:
 stop_loss_pct = 0.02 # 2%止损
 else:
 # 基于波动率的动态止损
 stop_loss_pct = max(0.01, min(0.05, volatility * 0.5))
 
 # 计算止损距离
 if signal.signal_type == 'BUY':
 stop_loss_price = current_price * (1 - stop_loss_pct)
 else: # SELL
 stop_loss_price = current_price * (1 + stop_loss_pct)
 
 # 计算仓位大小
 risk_amount = risk_per_trade
 price_risk = abs(current_price - stop_loss_price)
 
 if price_risk > 0:
 position_size = int(risk_amount / price_risk)
 else:
 position_size = 0
 
 # 应用最大仓位限制
 max_position_value = self.max_position_size * portfolio_value
 max_shares = int(max_position_value / current_price)
 
 position_size = min(position_size, max_shares)
 
 # 存储止损价格
 self.stop_losses[signal.symbol] = stop_loss_price
 
 return position_size
 
 def check_risk_limits(self, proposed_position: int, current_position: int, 
 current_price: float, portfolio_value: float) -> bool:
 """检查风险限制"""
 
 # 计算新仓位的价值
 new_position_value = abs(proposed_position) * current_price
 
 # 检查仓位大小限制
 if new_position_value / portfolio_value > self.max_position_size:
 print(f"仓位超过限制: {new_position_value / portfolio_value:.2%} > {self.max_position_size:.2%}")
 return False
 
 # 检查组合总风险
 total_exposure = self.calculate_total_exposure()
 if total_exposure > 0.8: # 最大80%暴露
 print(f"组合风险过高: {total_exposure:.2%}")
 return False
 
 return True
 
 def calculate_total_exposure(self) -> float:
 """计算总风险暴露"""
 return self.current_exposure
 
 def update_stop_loss(self, symbol: str, current_price: float, atr: float = None):
 """更新止损价格"""
 if symbol in self.stop_losses:
 if atr is not None:
 # 使用ATR进行移动止损
 new_stop = current_price - 2 * atr if current_price > self.stop_losses[symbol] else self.stop_losses[symbol]
 self.stop_losses[symbol] = new_stop
 
 def should_exit_position(self, symbol: str, current_price: float) -> bool:
 """判断是否应该退出仓位"""
 if symbol in self.stop_losses:
 stop_price = self.stop_losses[symbol]
 
 # 检查止损
 if current_price <= stop_price:
 print(f"触发止损: {symbol} @ {current_price} <= {stop_price}")
 return True
 
 return False

class PositionSizing:
 """仓位大小计算器"""
 
 @staticmethod
 def fixed_ratio(portfolio_value: float, ratio: float = 0.1) -> float:
 """固定比例仓位"""
 return portfolio_value * ratio
 
 @staticmethod
 def kelly_criterion(win_rate: float, avg_win: float, avg_loss: float) -> float:
 """凯利公式"""
 if avg_loss == 0:
 return 0.0
 
 b = avg_win / avg_loss # 盈亏比
 p = win_rate # 胜率
 q = 1 - p # 败率
 
 # 凯利公式: f = (bp - q) / b
 kelly = (b * p - q) / b
 
 # 使用半凯利以降低风险
 return max(0, min(kelly, 0.25)) # 限制最大仓位25%
 
 @staticmethod
 def volatility_targeting(portfolio_value: float, target_volatility: float, 
 current_volatility: float) -> float:
 """基于波动率目标的仓位"""
 if current_volatility == 0:
 return 0.0
 
 # 根据目标波动率调整仓位
 volatility_ratio = target_volatility / current_volatility
 
 # 限制仓位在合理范围内
 return max(0, min(volatility_ratio, 2.0)) * portfolio_value * 0.1
 
 @staticmethod
 def risk_parity(portfolio_value: float, asset_volatility: float, 
 portfolio_volatility: float) -> float:
 """风险平价"""
 if asset_volatility == 0 or portfolio_volatility == 0:
 return 0.0
 
 # 计算风险贡献
 risk_contribution = asset_volatility / portfolio_volatility
 
 # 基于风险贡献分配资金
 return (portfolio_value * risk_contribution) / len([asset_volatility])

class BacktestEngine:
 """回测引擎"""
 
 def __init__(self, initial_capital: float = 100000, commission: float = 0.001):
 self.initial_capital = initial_capital
 self.commission = commission
 self.portfolio = {
 'cash': initial_capital,
 'positions': {},
 'value': initial_capital
 }
 self.trades = []
 self.equity_curve = []
 self.performance_metrics = {}
 
 def run_backtest(self, strategy, data: pd.DataFrame):
 """运行回测"""
 print(f"开始回测策略: {strategy.name}")
 
 # 重置组合
 self.portfolio = {
 'cash': self.initial_capital,
 'positions': {},
 'value': self.initial_capital
 }
 self.trades = []
 self.equity_curve = []
 
 # 按时间顺序处理数据
 for i in range(len(data)):
 current_data = data.iloc[:i+1]
 current_bar = data.iloc[i]
 
 # 生成信号
 signal = strategy.generate_signal(current_data)
 
 if signal and signal.signal_type != 'HOLD':
 # 执行交易
 self.execute_trade(signal, current_bar)
 
 # 更新组合价值
 self.update_portfolio_value(current_bar)
 
 # 记录权益曲线
 self.equity_curve.append({
 'timestamp': current_bar.name,
 'portfolio_value': self.portfolio['value'],
 'cash': self.portfolio['cash']
 })
 
 # 计算性能指标
 self.calculate_performance_metrics()
 
 return {
 'trades': self.trades,
 'equity_curve': self.equity_curve,
 'performance_metrics': self.performance_metrics
 }
 
 def execute_trade(self, signal: Signal, current_bar: pd.Series):
 """执行交易"""
 symbol = signal.symbol
 price = signal.price
 quantity = signal.quantity
 
 # 计算交易成本
 transaction_cost = quantity * price * self.commission
 
 if signal.signal_type == 'BUY':
 total_cost = quantity * price + transaction_cost
 
 if self.portfolio['cash'] >= total_cost:
 # 执行买入
 self.portfolio['cash'] -= total_cost
 
 if symbol in self.portfolio['positions']:
 self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] += quantity
 else:
 self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] = quantity
 
 trade = {
 'timestamp': current_bar.name,
 'symbol': symbol,
 'action': 'BUY',
 'quantity': quantity,
 'price': price,
 'cost': transaction_cost,
 'total_value': total_cost
 }
 self.trades.append(trade)
 print(f"买入: {quantity} {symbol} @ {price}")
 
 elif signal.signal_type == 'SELL':
 if symbol in self.portfolio['positions'] and self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] >= quantity:
 # 执行卖出
 total_revenue = quantity * price - transaction_cost
 self.portfolio['cash'] += total_revenue
 self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] -= quantity
 
 if self.portfolio['positions'][symbol] == 0:
 del self.portfolio['positions'][symbol]
 
 trade = {
 'timestamp': current_bar.name,
 'symbol': symbol,
 'action': 'SELL',
 'quantity': quantity,
 'price': price,
 'cost': transaction_cost,
 'total_value': total_revenue
 }
 self.trades.append(trade)
 print(f"卖出: {quantity} {symbol} @ {price}")
 
 def update_portfolio_value(self, current_bar: pd.Series):
 """更新组合价值"""
 total_value = self.portfolio['cash']
 
 for symbol, position in self.portfolio['positions'].items():
 if symbol == current_bar.get('symbol', ''):
 current_price = current_bar.get('close', 0)
 total_value += position * current_price
 
 self.portfolio['value'] = total_value
 
 def calculate_performance_metrics(self):
 """计算性能指标"""
 if not self.equity_curve:
 return
 
 # 转换为DataFrame
 equity_df = pd.DataFrame(self.equity_curve)
 equity_df['returns'] = equity_df['portfolio_value'].pct_change()
 
 # 基本指标
 total_return = (equity_df['portfolio_value'].iloc[-1] - self.initial_capital) / self.initial_capital
 
 # 年化收益率
 days = len(equity_df)
 annual_return = (1 + total_return) ** (252 / days) - 1
 
 # 波动率
 volatility = equity_df['returns'].std() * np.sqrt(252)
 
 # 夏普比率
 risk_free_rate = 0.03
 sharpe_ratio = (annual_return - risk_free_rate) / volatility if volatility > 0 else 0
 
 # 最大回撤
 cumulative = (1 + equity_df['returns']).cumprod()
 running_max = cumulative.expanding().max()
 drawdown = (cumulative - running_max) / running_max
 max_drawdown = drawdown.min()
 
 # 胜率
 if self.trades:
 winning_trades = [t for t in self.trades if t['action'] == 'SELL']
 win_rate = len(winning_trades) / len(self.trades) if len(self.trades) > 0 else 0
 else:
 win_rate = 0
 
 self.performance_metrics = {
 'total_return': total_return,
 'annual_return': annual_return,
 'volatility': volatility,
 'sharpe_ratio': sharpe_ratio,
 'max_drawdown': max_drawdown,
 'win_rate': win_rate,
 'total_trades': len(self.trades),
 'final_value': equity_df['portfolio_value'].iloc[-1]
 }

class PerformanceAnalyzer:
 """性能分析器"""
 
 def __init__(self):
 self.metrics = {}
 self.benchmark_returns = None
 
 def calculate_metrics(self, returns: pd.Series, benchmark_returns: pd.Series = None):
 """计算性能指标"""
 self.metrics = {}
 
 # 基本统计
 self.metrics['total_return'] = (1 + returns).prod() - 1
 self.metrics['annual_return'] = returns.mean() * 252
 self.metrics['volatility'] = returns.std() * np.sqrt(252)
 self.metrics['sharpe_ratio'] = (self.metrics['annual_return'] - 0.03) / self.metrics['volatility']
 
 # 最大回撤
 cumulative = (1 + returns).cumprod()
 running_max = cumulative.expanding().max()
 drawdown = (cumulative - running_max) / running_max
 self.metrics['max_drawdown'] = drawdown.min()
 
 # 卡尔马比率
 if abs(self.metrics['max_drawdown']) > 0:
 self.metrics['calmar_ratio'] = self.metrics['annual_return'] / abs(self.metrics['max_drawdown'])
 else:
 self.metrics['calmar_ratio'] = 0
 
 # 索提诺比率
 downside_returns = returns[returns < 0]
 if len(downside_returns) > 0:
 downside_std = downside_returns.std() * np.sqrt(252)
 self.metrics['sortino_ratio'] = (self.metrics['annual_return'] - 0.03) / downside_std
 else:
 self.metrics['sortino_ratio'] = 0
 
 # 与基准比较
 if benchmark_returns is not None:
 self.calculate_benchmark_metrics(returns, benchmark_returns)
 
 return self.metrics
 
 def calculate_benchmark_metrics(self, strategy_returns: pd.Series, benchmark_returns: pd.Series):
 """计算与基准相关的指标"""
 # 对齐时间序列
 aligned_data = pd.concat([strategy_returns, benchmark_returns], axis=1).dropna()
 strategy_aligned = aligned_data.iloc[:, 0]
 benchmark_aligned = aligned_data.iloc[:, 1]
 
 # Beta值
 covariance = np.cov(strategy_aligned, benchmark_aligned)[0, 1]
 benchmark_variance = np.var(benchmark_aligned)
 beta = covariance / benchmark_variance if benchmark_variance > 0 else 0
 
 # Alpha值
 strategy_return = strategy_aligned.mean() * 252
 benchmark_return = benchmark_aligned.mean() * 252
 alpha = strategy_return - (0.03 + beta * (benchmark_return - 0.03))
 
 # 信息比率
 active_returns = strategy_aligned - benchmark_aligned
 tracking_error = active_returns.std() * np.sqrt(252)
 information_ratio = (strategy_return - benchmark_return) / tracking_error if tracking_error > 0 else 0
 
 self.metrics.update({
 'beta': beta,
 'alpha': alpha,
 'information_ratio': information_ratio,
 'tracking_error': tracking_error
 })
 
 def generate_report(self) -> str:
 """生成性能报告"""
 report = f"""
策略性能分析报告
==================

基本指标:
---------
总收益率: {self.metrics.get('total_return', 0):.2%}
年化收益率: {self.metrics.get('annual_return', 0):.2%}
年化波动率: {self.metrics.get('volatility', 0):.2%}
夏普比率: {self.metrics.get('sharpe_ratio', 0):.2f}
最大回撤: {self.metrics.get('max_drawdown', 0):.2%}

风险调整指标:
-------------
卡尔马比率: {self.metrics.get('calmar_ratio', 0):.2f}
索提诺比率: {self.metrics.get('sortino_ratio', 0):.2f}

基准比较:
---------
Beta值: {self.metrics.get('beta', 'N/A')}
Alpha值: {self.metrics.get('alpha', 'N/A')}
信息比率: {self.metrics.get('information_ratio', 'N/A')}
跟踪误差: {self.metrics.get('tracking_error', 'N/A')}
"""
 return report

class FactorBuilder:
 """因子构建器"""
 
 def __init__(self):
 self.factors = {}
 self.factor_weights = {}
 
 def build_momentum_factors(self, data: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:
 """构建动量因子"""
 factors = pd.DataFrame(index=data.index)
 
 # 价格动量
 factors['price_momentum_1m'] = data['close'].pct_change(20)
 factors['price_momentum_3m'] = data['close'].pct_change(60)
 factors['price_momentum_6m'] = data['close'].pct_change(120)
 
 # 相对强度
 factors['rsi_14'] = MomentumIndicators.rsi(data['close'].values)
 
 # 移动平均斜率
 ma_20 = TrendIndicators.sma(data['close'].values, 20)
 factors['ma_slope'] = np.gradient(ma_20) if len(ma_20) > 1 else np.zeros(len(data))
 
 return factors
 
 def build_value_factors(self, data: pd.DataFrame, fundamental_data: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:
 """构建价值因子"""
 factors = pd.DataFrame(index=data.index)
 
 if fundamental_data is not None:
 # 市盈率
 factors['pe_ratio'] = fundamental_data.get('pe_ratio', np.nan)
 
 # 市净率
 factors['pb_ratio'] = fundamental_data.get('pb_ratio', np.nan)
 
 # 股息率
 factors['dividend_yield'] = fundamental_data.get('dividend_yield', np.nan)
 
 # 价值综合评分（越低越好）
 factors['value_score'] = (
 factors['pe_ratio'].rank(pct=True) * 0.4 +
 factors['pb_ratio'].rank(pct=True) * 0.4 +
 (1 - factors['dividend_yield'].rank(pct=True)) * 0.2
 )
 
 return factors
 
 def build_quality_factors(self, data: pd.DataFrame, fundamental_data: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:
 """构建质量因子"""
 factors = pd.DataFrame(index=data.index)
 
 if fundamental_data is not None:
 # ROE
 factors['roe'] = fundamental_data.get('roe', np.nan)
 
 # ROA
 factors['roa'] = fundamental_data.get('roa', np.nan)
 
 # 负债率
 factors['debt_ratio'] = fundamental_data.get('debt_ratio', np.nan)
 
 # 盈利稳定性
 if 'net_income' in fundamental_data.columns:
 factors['earnings_stability'] = fundamental_data['net_income'].rolling(8).std()
 
 # 质量综合评分
 factors['quality_score'] = (
 factors['roe'].rank(pct=True) * 0.4 +
 factors['roa'].rank(pct=True) * 0.3 +
 (1 - factors['debt_ratio'].rank(pct=True)) * 0.3
 )
 
 return factors
 
 def build_volatility_factors(self, data: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:
 """构建波动率因子"""
 factors = pd.DataFrame(index=data.index)
 
 # 历史波动率
 returns = data['close'].pct_change()
 factors['volatility_20d'] = returns.rolling(20).std() * np.sqrt(252)
 factors['volatility_60d'] = returns.rolling(60).std() * np.sqrt(252)
 
 # 最大回撤
 cumulative = (1 + returns).cumprod()
 running_max = cumulative.expanding().max()
 drawdown = (cumulative - running_max) / running_max
 factors['max_drawdown_6m'] = drawdown.rolling(120).min()
 
 return factors
